description: Unknown but perhaps a blend of snappy +‎ jazzy, or from Irish snas (“polish; good appearance”).

entries.meaning: (informal) Elegant in manner of dress; stylish, modern or appealing in appearance; flashy.
examples: Synonyms: dapper, elegant, pizazzy, smart, cool

entries.meaning: (informal) Excellent; clever, ingenious, or adept in behavior, operation, or execution.
examples: Antonyms: (coarse slang) crappy, duff, (informal, especially US) lame, (informal) naff, (informal) rubbishy
